summary: Proved eval_saturated_bundle_exists theorem without sorry. Used box_dne_theorem and mcs_contrapositive to bridge neg(Box phi) to diamondFormula(neg phi), then defined saturated bundle as {base} ∪ allWitnesses using axiom of choice.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting the completed proof of eval_saturated_bundle_exists
CoherentConstruction.lean with proven eval_saturated_bundle_exists theorem (no sorry)

completion_data.completion_summary: Proved eval_saturated_bundle_exists theorem, eliminating the final sorry in the EvalBMCS construction. The proof uses box_dne_theorem and mcs_contrapositive to transform neg(Box phi) to diamondFormula(neg phi), then constructs the saturated bundle as {base} ∪ allWitnesses using axiom of choice. This provides a complete, axiom-free path from consistent context to EvalBMCS sufficient for completeness.
